channel.title: Localhost
channel.description: Hey i got a question... If i look in the map Connectedfrom and i click on my name, i say by ip localhost? How can i change that i log in with marubunipk.no-ip.biz? No-ip says my ip is 82.156.240.230? And if i log in i connect with localhost? Some1 help me? :confused: :| :o

item.title: Localhost
item.dc:creator: @kingstun kingstun
item.description:
@kingstun wrote:

Are you logging on the same computer which the server is running on?
If yes then thats why the server thinks that you are connecting thru localhost(127.0.0.1).
If No then you the server is messed up.

Read full topic
